GtmNoScript.description: Add <noscript> fallback (iframe to ns.html). Set false to disable.

GtmAttribs.description: Attributes for the main <script> tag. nonce is auto-injected if CSP supports it.

GtmData.description: Keys to pull from OutputPage::getJSVars() and push into dataLayer.

GtmBeforeTag.description: Raw HTML to inject before GTM script.

GtmAfterTag.description: Raw HTML to inject after GTM script.

GtmTagGatewayPath.description: Path for first-party Google Tag Gateway (e.g. /metrics or /analytics).

GtmTagGateway.description: Enable first-party tag gateway (use GtmTagGatewayPath for gtm.js). When true, noscript is suppressed.
